ch.aplu.turtle

Class TurtleKeyAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
      • ch.aplu.turtle.TurtleKeyAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class TurtleKeyAdapter
extends java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
    Class that overides KeyAdapter.keyPressed() in order to get key events. You must register an instance with Turtle.addKeyListener().
